public static final SimpleCommandLineParser[] EMPTY_ARRAY
Constructor Detail

SimpleCommandLineParser

public SimpleCommandLineParser(java.lang.String[] arg)
Initializes the command line parser by parsing the command line args using simple rules.

The arguments are parsed into keys and values and are saved into a HashMap. Any argument that begins with a '--' or '-' is assumed to be a key. If the following argument doesn't have a '--'/'-' it is assumed to be a value of the preceding argument.

Method Detail

getValue

public java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String... keys)
Returns the value of the first key found in the map.

containsKey

public boolean containsKey(java.lang.String... keys)
Returns true if any of the given keys are present in the map.
